fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Negate all abilities used on you tonight. You will use the ability of anyone who visits you on everyone else who visits you tonight. (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Redirect and Roleblock Immunity
- With the Necromonicon, you may use your ability and unlimited amount of times and may use it on any player. You will additionally deal a Basic attack to your target.
